  • Method Details

    • sendErrorMessage

      public static void sendErrorMessage(Communicable ch, String status, String errorMessage, int errorCode)
      Sends an error message to the client
      Parameters:
      ch - The Communicable interface of the client which caused the error
      status - "LOGIN" or "ACTION"
      errorMessage - the string which will be shown to the user
      errorCode - an integer representing the error which occurred

    • handleMessage

      public void handleMessage(String jsonMessage, Communicable ch) throws GameEndedException
      Handles a message received from a Client and sends the appropriate response
      Parameters:
      jsonMessage - the message received from the client
      ch - the Communicable interface of the client which sent the message
      Throws:
      GameEndedException

    • getMessageStatus

      private String getMessageStatus(String json)
      Return the status field of the given json message
      Parameters:
      json - a JSON string containing the message to get the status of
      Returns:
      the status field of the given json message

    • handlePong

      private void handlePong()
      Handles a pong message

    • handleLoginMessage

      private void handleLoginMessage(String jsonMessage, Communicable ch)
      Deserializes and handles a login message
      Parameters:
      jsonMessage - Json string which contains a login message
      ch - the Communicable interface of the client who sent the message

    • handleSetUsername

      private void handleSetUsername(Communicable ch, String username)
      Handles the SET_USERNAME login message. If the user is not authenticated, tries to add him to loggedUsers. If the user is already authenticated, tries to change his username
      Parameters:
      ch - the Communicable interface of the client who sent the message
      username - a username

    • setGameParameters

      private void setGameParameters(Communicable ch, int numPlayers, boolean isExpert)
      Sets the desired number of players of the game and whether to play in expert mode
      Parameters:
      ch - the Communicable interface of the client who sent the message
      numPlayers - the value contained in the message received

    • setLoadedGameParameters

      private void setLoadedGameParameters(Communicable ch)

    • addUser

      private void addUser(Communicable ch, String username)
      Adds the user who sent the message to the list of logged users
      Parameters:
      ch - the Communicable interface of the client who sent the message
      username - the username of the user to be added

    • renameUser

      private void renameUser(Communicable ch, String newUsername)
      Changes the username of the user who sent the message
      Parameters:
      ch - the Communicable interface of the client who sent the message
      newUsername - the username of the user to be added

    • sendBroadcastMessage

      private void sendBroadcastMessage()
      Sends a message to every logged user containing the usernames of all logged users and the desired number of players of the game, which can be -1 (not specified yet), 2, 3 or 4

    • getServerLoginMessage

      private ServerLoginMessage getServerLoginMessage(String message)
      Returns a ServerLoginMessage with the current GameLobby and number of players and a custom message
      Parameters:
      message - the String to put in the field displayText of the message
      Returns:
      a ServerLoginMessage object

    • askDesiredNumberOfPlayers

      private void askDesiredNumberOfPlayers(Communicable ch)
      Sends a message asking for the desired number of players and the mode of the game
      Parameters:
      ch - the Communicable interface of the player to send the message to

    • startGameIfReady

      private boolean startGameIfReady()
      Checks if a game can be started; if so, every client in the lobby is notified
      Returns:
      true if the game was started, false otherwise

    • sanitizePlayers

      private void sanitizePlayers()
      If loading from a saved game, assures that the loggedUsers are in the same order as in the loaded game and kicks any player who was not in the loaded game

    • handleActionMessage

      private void handleActionMessage(String jsonMessage, Communicable ch) throws GameEndedException
      Deserializes and handles an action message
      Parameters:
      jsonMessage - Json string which contains an action message
      ch - the Communicable interface of the client who sent the message
      Throws:
      GameEndedException

    • startPingPong

      public void startPingPong()
      Periodically sends a "ping" message to every client and awaits for a "pong" response. This is done on a parallel thread

    • sendPingAndReturnBound

      private int sendPingAndReturnBound()
      Sends a "PING" message to every client and returns how many messages have been sent
      Returns:
      how many "PING" messages have been sent

    • getPongCount

      public int getPongCount()

    • getLoggedUsers

      public ArrayList<PlayerClient> getLoggedUsers()

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
